summary: A darkly comic tale of a world in which the female population are slowly, and methodically doing away with their male counterparts.
cast: Simon Yam|Annie Liu|Nick Cheung|Irene Wan|Maggie Siu|On-On Yu|Lap-Man Tan|Ga-Leung Chan|Sui-man Chim|Hiroshi Fukazawa|Goo-Bi GC|Ka Tung Lam|Wai-Hang Lau|Wai-Ming Pang|Gregory Charles Rivers|Susan Yam-Yam Shaw|So-Foon Wong
title: Cheut ai kup gei
